HAINAN RICE

Our Website

Ingredients

To make the hainan fried rice there are 4 main parts you have to prepare.

For the Hainan rice:

  • 2 cups of washed rice (soaked for 30 minutes)
  • 2 cup chicken stock
  • 1 tbsp sesame oil
  • 1 tbsp oyster sauce
  • 2 tbsp soy sauce
  • 2 tsp salt
  • 1/2 tbsp sugar
  • 1/2 tsp pepper

For the Garlic oil:

  • 75 ml oil
  • 12 cloves garlc, fine minced
  • 5 cm ginger, grated

For the Scallion oil:

  • 5 pcs scaliion, chopped
  • 2 cm ginger, grated
  • 2 cloves garlic, finely minced
  • 1 tbsp sesame oil
  • 1 tbsp oyster oil
  • 1/2 tsp salt
  • 1 tsp sugar
  • 1/2 tsp pepper
  • 40 ml oil

For the Chicken stock / Broth:

  • 500 gr chicken feet / bones
  • 4L water
  • 3 cloves garlic, skin on
  • 1 cm ginger, pounded
  • 150 gr white cabbage
  • 2 pc white part of scallion, sliced
  • 1 tsp sugar
  • 1 tsp pepper
  • 1 tsp salt

Steps

  1. Brine the chicken by soaking the chicken breast fillet with water, salt, and sugar and then leave it for 2 hours or overnight in the refrigerator.
  2. For the broth, bring the water to a boil and then boil the claws, bones, garlic, and ginger for Â±30 minutes.
  3. For the garlic oil, heat the oil and then add the ginger and garlic after they are half dry, reduce the heat and stir until golden brown, set aside.
  4. For the Hainanese rice, add the pre-soaked rice, broth, garlic oil, soy sauce, sesame oil, oyster sauce, salt, and pepper then stir and place the chicken breast fillet on top then sprinkle with sugar then cook with rice cooker until cooked. After it's cooked, remove the chicken so it's not over cooked, then stir in the rice.
  5. For the scallion oil, in a bowl mix the scallions, ginger, garlic, sesame oil, oyster sauce, sugar, salt, and pepper then pour in hot oil and stir until smooth.
  6. For the gravy, add the white part of the leek, cabbage, sugar, salt, seasoning, and pepper to taste into the chicken stock and cook until the cabbage wilts and the gravy turns white.
  7. Put the Hainanese rice on a plate then place the chicken slices on it then drizzle with garlic oil and scallion oil, put coriander leaves and chili slices on top then serve with chili sauce, gravy, and chicken soy sauce as a complement

Your homemade hainan rice is ready to be served! ^^

For a clearer picture, you can go and visit the original creator! ^^
